In England, in the seven days to 30 October, there were 233,404 new confirmed cases (412.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 23 October, there were 272,472 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 14% (39,068 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 04 November is 7,823,979 (13,835.5 cases per 100,000 population).
